The joint stock company was an inflection point for humanity. We could assemble capital and labor together to work towards a bigger goal.

The joint token organization might be the best next step. The incentives of the system get lots of people to work together in new ways.

1024716003836665857.text: 4/4 One possible solution are registries of secure frontends maintained by experts. We need a TCR for frontends to allow users to identify secure applications. 1031938994119094272.text: Panvala’s token capacitor is designed with the lessons from our first token capacitor, created and tested during the ConsenSys company retreat in February 2018.https://media.consensys.net/the-panvala-token-capacitor-b9efac0a6699 …

1018880848102350852.text: Last week, we announced Panvala, a decentralized system that helps participants mark smart contracts that are safer than others. Today, we’re opening applications for Panvala partners who want to make sure they can participate from day one.https://medium.com/@Panvala/become-a-panvala-partner-4a9154c829e7 …

1016338042699821056.text: Panvala lets us build a decentralized source of truth so the entire community can cooperate to make Ethereum safer.

1016337943382904832.text: For users to be able to use smart contracts safely, they need trusted, human opinions about which contracts are safer to use. But we don’t want ConsenSys Diligence to be a single source of truth about what’s safe and what isn’t—rebuilding a centralized world is a waste of time.

1016337610787180545.text: Panvala is a decentralized system that helps participants mark smart contracts that are safer than others.https://medium.com/panvala/introducing-panvala-8cb9db97c316 …
